flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Lives in thenshadows of tallntrees where itfeats insects. Itnis attracted bynlight at night.
Lives in thenshadows of tallntrees where itfeats insects. Itnis attracted bynlight at night.
Its large eyes actnas radars. In anbright place, youfcan see that theynare clusters ofnmany tiny eyes.
Its eyes alsonfunction as radarnunits. It catchesfand eats smallnbugs that hide inndarkness.
Poison oozes fromnall over its body.nIt catches andfeats small bugs atnnight that are at­ntracted by light.
The small bugs itneats appear onlynat night, so itfsleeps in a holenin a tree untilnnight falls.
VENONAT is said to have evolved withna coat of thin, stiff hair that coversnits entire body for protection.fIt possesses large eyes that never failnto spot even miniscule prey.
VENONAT is said to have evolved withna coat of thin, stiff hair that coversnits entire body for protection.fIt possesses large eyes that never failnto spot even miniscule prey.
Its coat of thin, stiff hair that coversnits entire body is said to have evolvednfor protection. Its large eyes never failnto spot even miniscule prey.
Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to benactive in darkness. The eyes can alsonshoot powerful beams.
Lives in the shadows of tall trees wherenit eats bugs. It is attracted by lightnat night.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Its eyes also function as radarnunits. It catches and eats smallnbugs that hide in darkness.
Poison oozes from all over its body.nIt catches and eats small bugs atnnight that are attracted by light.
Ses grands yeux sont en fait desnamas d’yeux minuscules. La nuit,nil est attiré par la lumière.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Ses grands yeux sont en fait desnamas d’yeux minuscules. La nuit,nil est attiré par la lumière.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
Its big eyes are actually clustersnof tiny eyes. At night, its kind isndrawn by light.
ちいさな　めが　たくさん　あつまってnおおきな　めに　なっている。nよるになると　あかりに　あつまる。
작은 눈이 많이 모여n큰 눈을 이루고 있다.n밤이 되면 불빛을 향해 모여든다.
Ses grands yeux sont en fait des amas d’yeuxnminuscules. La nuit, il est attiré par la lumière.
Seine großen Augen bestehen aus vielen kleinennAugen. Nachts wird es von Licht angezogen.
Sus grandes ojos son en realidad grupos de ojosndiminutos. Por la noche se siente atraído por la luz.
I suoi grandi occhi sono in realtà un insieme di tantinpiccoli occhi. Di notte, è attirato dalla luce.
Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes.nAt night, its kind is drawn by light.
小さな　目が　たくさん　集まってn大きな　目に　なっている。n夜になると　明かりに　集まる。
おおきな　きのしたに　すんでいてnむしなどを　たべて　いるらしい。nよるは　あかりのそばに　やってくる。
커다란 나무 밑에서 살며n벌레 따위를 먹고 지내는 듯하다.n밤에는 빛 주위로 찾아온다.
Il vit à l’ombre des grands arbres où il se nourritnd’insectes. Il est attiré par la lumière.
Dieses Pokémon lebt im Schatten großer Bäume.nEs frisst Insekten und wird von Licht angezogen.
Vive entre las sombras de árboles altos, donde comeninsectos. Por la noche, le atrae la luz.
Vive all’ombra di alberi alti, dove si nutre di insetti.nDi notte è attirato dalla luce.
Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eatsnbugs. It is attracted by light at night.
大きな　木の下に　住んでいてn虫などを　食べているらしい。n夜は　明かりのそばに　やってくる。
みを　まもるために　ほそく　かたい　たいもうがnぜんしんを　おおうように　なったと　いわれる。nちいさな　えものも　みのがさない　めを　もつ。
몸을 지키기 위해 가늘고 딱딱한 털이n전신을 둘러싸게 됐다고 전해진다.n작은 먹잇감도 놓치지 않는 눈을 가졌다.
On raconte que Mimitoss a évolué avec une fourrure de poilsnfins et drus qui protège son corps tout entier. Il est doté dengrands yeux capables de repérer ses proies, même minuscules.
Bluzuk hat einen Pelz aus dünnen Borsten entwickelt, der demnSchutz seines Körpers dient. Es hat große Augen, denen auchnwinzig kleine Beute nicht entgeht.
Dicen que durante su evolución Venonat desarrolló una financapa de espeso pelo alrededor de todo el cuerpo paranprotegerse. Tiene unos ojos tan grandes que no hay presanque le pase desapercibida.
Si dice che per proteggersi Venonat abbia sviluppato unanpelliccia sottile e irsuta che ricopre il suo corpo. Nemmenonla preda più piccola può sfuggire ai suoi occhi enormi.
Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin,nstiff hair that covers its entire body for protection.nIt possesses large eyes that never fail to spot evennminuscule prey.
身を　守るために　細く　硬い　体毛がn全身を　覆うように　なったと　いわれる。n小さな　獲物を　見逃さない　目を　持つ。
みを　まもるために　ほそく　かたい　たいもうがnぜんしんを　おおうように　なったと　いわれる。nちいさな　えものも　みのがさない　めを　もつ。
몸을 지키기 위해 가늘고 딱딱한 털이n전신을 둘러싸게 됐다고 전해진다.n작은 먹잇감도 놓치지 않는 눈을 가졌다.
On raconte que Mimitoss a évolué avec une fourrure de poilsnfins et drus qui protège son corps tout entier. Il est doté dengrands yeux capables de repérer ses proies, même minuscules.
Bluzuk hat einen Pelz aus dünnen Borsten entwickelt, der demnSchutz seines Körpers dient. Es hat große Augen, denen auchnwinzig kleine Beute nicht entgeht.
Dicen que durante su evolución Venonat desarrolló una financapa de espeso pelo alrededor de todo el cuerpo paranprotegerse. Tiene unos ojos tan grandes que no hay presanque le pase desapercibida.
Si dice che per proteggersi Venonat abbia sviluppato unanpelliccia sottile e irsuta che ricopre il suo corpo. Nemmenonla preda più piccola può sfuggire ai suoi occhi enormi.
Venonat is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hairnthat covers its entire body for protection. It possesses largeneyes that never fail to spot even minuscule prey.
身を　守るために　細く　硬い　体毛がn全身を　覆うように　なったと　いわれる。n小さな　獲物を　見逃さない　目を　持つ。
レーダーになる　おおきな　めはnあかるいところでは　ちいさな　めがnあつまって　できているのが　わかる。
레이더 역할을 하는 큰 눈은n밝은 곳에서 보면 작은 눈이 모여서n이루어진 것임을 알 수 있다.
在明亮的地方看就會發現n那對有著雷達作用的大眼睛，n是由許多小眼睛聚集而成的。
Ses grands yeux lui servent de radar. En pleinenlumière, on peut y distinguer des facettes.
Seine großen Augen fungieren als Radar.nIm Licht kann man erkennen, dass sie ausnunzähligen, sehr kleinen Augen bestehen.
Sus grandes ojos actúan como radares. A plenanluz se percibe que son, en realidad, grupos denojos diminutos.
Gli occhi enormi fungono da radar. Alla lucensi può notare che sono formati da molti occhinpiù piccoli.
Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, youncan see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.
レーダーになる　大きな　目はn明るいところでは　小さな　目がn集まって　できているのが　わかる。
在明亮的地方你便能发现它n具有雷达功能的大眼其实是n由许多个小眼睛聚集而成的。
